p: Spatial and temporal clusters of indigenous DF cases were showed in Fig 5A and 5B, respectively. The most likely clusters (n = 9) were detected each year during 2006 to 2014 ( P<0.01) and the secondary clusters (n = 2) were identified in 2006 and 2013 ( P<0.01) ( Table 1). The most likely clusters were concentrated in streets of Yuexiu, Liwan and Haizhu districts. In 2006, the most likely cluster included the southern Panyu district and part of the southern Nansha district whereas the secondary cluster included the northern Conghua district. In 2014, the most likely clusters included the farther northern Baiyun district with the secondary clusters in the northern Zengcheng district ( Table 1).
